verses.verse: Then I looked, <WH7200> and, behold, <WH2009> in <WH413> the firmament <WH7549> that <WH834> was above <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of the cherubims <WH3742> there appeared <WH7200> over <WH5921> them as it were a sapphire <WH5601> stone, <WH68> as the appearance <WH4758> of the likeness <WH1823> of a throne. <WH3678>

Now the cherubims <WH3742> stood <WH5975> on the right side <WH4480> <WH3225> of the house, <WH1004> when the man <WH376> went in; <WH935> and the cloud <WH6051> filled <WH4390> the inner <WH6442> <WH853> court. <WH2691>

And the sound <WH6963> of the cherubims' <WH3742> wings <WH3671> was heard <WH8085> even to <WH5704> the outer <WH2435> court, <WH2691> as the voice <WH6963> of the Almighty <WH7706> God <WH410> when he speaketh. <WH1696>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> that when he had commanded <WH6680> <WH853> the man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> with linen, <WH906> saying, <WH559> Take <WH3947> fire <WH784> from between <WH4480> <WH996> the wheels, <WH1534> from between <WH4480> <WH996> the cherubims; <WH3742> then he went in, <WH935> and stood <WH5975> beside <WH681> the wheels. <WH212>

And one cherub <WH3742> stretched forth <WH7971> <WH853> his hand <WH3027> from between <WH4480> <WH996> the cherubims <WH3742> unto <WH413> the fire <WH784> that <WH834> was between <WH996> the cherubims, <WH3742> and took <WH5375> thereof, and put <WH5414> it into <WH413> the hands <WH2651> of him that was clothed <WH3847> with linen: <WH906> who took <WH3947> it, and went out. <WH3318>
And there appeared <WH7200> in the cherubims <WH3742> the form <WH8403> of a man's <WH120> hand <WH3027> under <WH8478> their wings. <WH3671>

And when I looked, <WH7200> behold <WH2009> the four <WH702> wheels <WH212> by <WH681> the cherubims, <WH3742> one <WH259> wheel <WH212> by <WH681> one <WH259> cherub, <WH3742> and another <WH259> wheel <WH212> by <WH681> another <WH259> cherub: <WH3742> and the appearance <WH4758> of the wheels <WH212> was as the color <WH5869> of a beryl <WH8658> stone. <WH68>
And as for their appearances, <WH4758> they four <WH702> had one <WH259> likeness, <WH1823> as if <WH834> a wheel <WH212> had been <WH1961> in the midst <WH8432> of a wheel. <WH212>

When they went, <WH1980> they went <WH1980> upon <WH413> their four <WH702> sides; <WH7253> they turned <WH5437> not <WH3808> as they went, <WH1980> but <WH3588> to the place <WH4725> whither <WH834> the head <WH7218> looked <WH6437> they followed <WH1980> <WH310> it; they turned <WH5437> not <WH3808> as they went. <WH1980>

And their whole <WH3605> body, <WH1320> and their backs, <WH1354> and their hands, <WH3027> and their wings, <WH3671> and the wheels, <WH212> were full <WH4392> of eyes <WH5869> round about, <WH5439> even the wheels <WH212> that they four <WH702> had.
As for the wheels, <WH212> it was cried <WH7121> unto them in my hearing, <WH241> O wheel. <WH1534>

And every one <WH259> had four <WH702> faces: <WH6440> the first <WH259> face <WH6440> was the face <WH6440> of a cherub, <WH3742> and the second <WH8145> face <WH6440> was the face <WH6440> of a man, <WH120> and the third <WH7992> the face <WH6440> of a lion, <WH738> and the fourth <WH7243> the face <WH6440> of an eagle. <WH5404>
And the cherubims <WH3742> were lifted up. <WH7426> This <WH1931> is the living creature <WH2416> that <WH834> I saw <WH7200> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar. <WH3529>

And when the cherubims <WH3742> went, <WH1980> the wheels <WH212> went <WH1980> by <WH681> them: and when the cherubims <WH3742> lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> their wings <WH3671> to mount up <WH7311> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> the same <WH1992> wheels <WH212> also <WH1571> turned <WH5437> not <WH3808> from beside <WH4480> <WH681> them.

When they stood, <WH5975> these stood; <WH5975> and when they were lifted up, <WH7311> these lifted up <WH7426> themselves also: for <WH3588> the spirit <WH7307> of the living creature <WH2416> was in them.

And the cherubims <WH3742> lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> their wings, <WH3671> and mounted up <WH7426> from <WH4480> the earth <WH776> in my sight: <WH5869> when they went out, <WH3318> the wheels <WH212> also were beside <WH5980> them, and every one stood <WH5975> at the door <WH6607> of the east <WH6931> gate <WH8179> of the LORD's <WH3068> house; <WH1004> and the glory <WH3519> of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> was over <WH5921> them above. <WH4480> <WH4605>

This <WH1931> is the living creature <WH2416> that <WH834> I saw <WH7200> under <WH8478> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> by the river <WH5104> of Chebar; <WH3529> and I knew <WH3045> that <WH3588> they <WH1992> were the cherubims. <WH3742>
